userStories.title: Work Policy Contract (WPC) registry API (signed policies)
userStories.description: As a platform, I want a signed policy registry so jobs can pin a WPC hash and gateways/verifiers can enforce it.
acceptanceCriteria: Define a canonical WPC JSON shape + hashing (JCS + SHA-256)
Implement create/read endpoints that return signed WPC envelopes
Document how policy_hash is computed and validated
userStories.notes: Implemented services/clawcontrols with POST/GET /v1/wpc backed by Durable Objects. WPCs are addressed by policy_hash_b64u = sha256(JCS(payload)) and returned as signed envelopes (Ed25519, signer_did=did:key).
